name: HeavyGearCharacterBuilder
tagline: Character Builder for the Silhouette / Heavy Gear system
body:
### What is it?
This project is all about creating a tool for the Heavy Gear / Silhouette RPG system. It allows you to fill out the normal character sheet details, save them to HTML local storage for you to keep, and eventually will have the ability to export this information.

### Shout outs
Sean Carnes (@carnes) is thus far the only contributor and has been integral part to this project's continuing improvement. Thanks for the motivation and the constant help.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
